newsitem.title: FINLAND: Valmet wins Asia linerboard machine orders.
newsitem.headline: Valmet wins Asia linerboard machine orders.

text.p: Finnish paper and paperboard machine maker Valmet Oy said in a statement on Tuesday it had won an order for a new linerboard machine from South Korea and an order to rebuild a linerboard machine in Taiwan.
The value of the contracts was not given.

Valmet will deliver the new linerboard machine to the Yangsan mill of South Korea's Han Joo Paper Co. The machine, with an output capacity of about 150,000 tonnes per year, is scheduled for start-up in spring 1998.
Valmet will also rebuild a fluting machine at Taiwan's Cheng Loong Co Ltd Ta-Yuan plant into a linerboard machine. The modernisation equipment will be supplied in spring 1997, Valmet said.
